title: The Making of a Cookbook
itunes:title: The Making of a Cookbook
description:
In this episode, Bobby and Sophie go behind the scenes and uncover all of the hidden details that come with making a great cookbook. Listen to hear Bobby's recipe writing and testing process, his thoughts on the role of a co-author, and of course, find out which recipe he and Sophie are cooking this week!

To find out more about "Always Hungry", follow the hosts on Instagram:

Bobby Flay's page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay's page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
